participant_1.background:
I am a good swimmer and I enjoy teaching my children to swim.
I've been spending more time at the farmers market since I quit my job.
my family is poor.
I'm single and enjoy my freedom, but I'm open to meeting someone special.
my car is blue.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a way to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
I still remember the feeling of freedom I felt when I would dance in my room alone.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.
everyday i go swimming at the y.
I enjoy listening to music that inspires me to work hard and achieve my goals.

content.text: I am doing well. I just quit my job to pursue my passion of teaching swimming. I am going to be teaching kids how to swim at the local pool.
That is awesome! I love swimming. I go to the Y everyday to swim. I also enjoy dancing. It is a great way to relieve stress and get in shape.
I used to love dancing! I would dance in my room all the time when I was younger. I need to start dancing again. I think it would be a great way to stay in shape.
It is a great way to stay in shape. It is also a great way to express yourself and have fun.
I agree. I am going to start dancing again! I have been listening to music that inspires me to work hard and achieve my goals. I think that will help motivate me to dance more.
That is a great idea! I am sure that will help you to dance more. I also love listening to music that inspires me to work hard and achieve my goals. It is a great way to get pumped up and motivated.
I am excited to start dancing again! I think it will be a lot of fun.
I am sure it will be! I love dancing. It is a great way to relieve stress and get in shape.
I agree! I am glad that you are a fan of dancing too. I think we should dance together sometime!
I would love to dance with you! I am sure it would be a lot of fun.
Great! I will let you know when I am available to dance.
Sounds good! I am looking forward to it.
